Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Establishes a small business tax credit for the employment of disabled persons
Summary: Establishes a small business tax credit for the employment of disabled persons.
LawCode: Amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L; add §25-d, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the labor law, in relation to establishing a small business tax credit for the employment of disabled persons; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
